title: Story Sections

sub_fields.label: What do you want this section to contain?
sub_fields.name: section_contents

sub_fields.label: Pull Quote Color
sub_fields.name: pquote_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Remember that your choice will be overridden if a background colour has already been set on the card or section this quote is used in.

sub_fields.label: Whose quote is this?
sub_fields.name: bquote_source_individual
sub_fields.instructions: Although you can still add an individual's name here, normally a description might be enough!

sub_fields.label: Video Embed Code
sub_fields.name: video_embed_code
sub_fields.instructions: You can use the Vimeo share code here. Note: Youtube links work too!

sub_fields.label: Select Block Graphic
sub_fields.name: block_graphic_select
sub_fields.instructions: Select an SVG image from the library

sub_fields.label: Select a page, story, or collaboration
sub_fields.name: grid_exchange_object

sub_fields.label: Pull quote colour
sub_fields.name: pquote_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Remember that your choice might be overridden if a background colour has already been set on the card or section this quote is used in

sub_fields.label: Select Block Graphic
sub_fields.name: block_graphic_select
sub_fields.instructions: Select an SVG image from the library

sub_fields.label: Button Text
sub_fields.name: button_text
sub_fields.instructions: Select an SVG image from the library

description: Add (coloured) sections to pages or stories
